```{r install-packages, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c(
  "forecast", "graphics", "TTR", "TSA", "aTSA", "lmtest", "MLmetrics", 
  "car", "dplyr", "MASS", "tsibble", "tseries", "ggplot2", "nortest"
))
```

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(forecast)
library(graphics)

library(TSA)
library(aTSA)
library(lmtest)
library(MLmetrics)
library(car)
library(dplyr)

library(ggplot2)
library(nortest)
```
